name: Jack
description: Jack is a potted potato. Currently 4 months old. He'll need to be re-potted soon and moved outdoors. He likes to have a lot of sunlight.

name: Apple
description: This is apple. She's an indoor perennial daisy. She needs to be watered weekly in the summer!

name: Ivor
description: Ivor is a cactus. Don't water Ivor, he'll be ok.
